definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3
shi4 jie4 wen2 hua4 yi2 chan3 di4
Fei1 wu4 zhi4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

sentences.english: Dazu Rock Carvings in 1999 was inscribed on the World Heritage List.
sentences.chinese: 大足石刻1999年被列入世界文化遺產名錄。

sentences.english: Is that impression a cultural heritage?
sentences.chinese: 這個印象是文化遺產嗎？

sentences.english: These ancient paintings are part of the cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 這些古畫是文化遺產的一部分。

sentences.english: The town of Lunenburg just like Tongli is also a World Cultural Heritage site.
sentences.chinese: 盧嫩堡一樣的同裏鎮也是世界文化遺產名錄。

sentences.english: Employed as an associate professor in the Department of Culture Heritage , Design and Art School, Beijing Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 張帆，北京理工大學設計藝術學院文化遺產系副教授。

sentences.english: The protection and use of non-matter cultural legacies depend on each other.
sentences.chinese: 非物質文化遺產的保護與利用是緊密聯繫在一起的。

sentences.english: Shaanxi is also abundant in natural beauty beyond its rich historical legacy.
sentences.chinese: 陝西富有的自然美景超出了豐富的歷史文化遺產。

sentences.english: Therefore braise-oven technology of roast duck is considered to be a non-material cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，燜爐烤鴨工藝是急需保護的非物質文化遺產。

sentences.english: In 1994, the potala palace was listed as world cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 1994年，布達拉宮被列爲世界文化遺產。

sentences.english: The museum collects many Olympic and Olympic Sailing Regatta cultural heritages.
sentences.chinese: 館內收藏了大量的奧運會和奧帆賽文化遺產。

sentences.english: Kunqu Opera is rated by UNESCO as Oral and Non-material Heritage of Mankind.
sentences.chinese: 崑曲評爲“人類口頭和非物質文化遺產”。

sentences.english: Hallstatt was listed as a World Heritage Site in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，哈爾斯塔特被列入世界文化遺產。

sentences.english: What are eight municipal Karamay City, "non-material cultural heritage"?
sentences.chinese: 克拉瑪依市有哪八項市級“非物質文化遺產”？

sentences.english: Xinjiang Muqam is a masterpiece of intangible cultural heritages in China.
sentences.chinese: 新疆木卡姆是中國非物質文化遺產代表作之一。

sentences.english: Shan Jixiang, who is here on an inspection tour, spoke highly of the province's achievements made in cultural heritage protection.
sentences.chinese: 單霽翔高度肯定我省文化遺產保護工作取得的成績。

sentences.english: Huizhou cultural heritage was the important tourism resources which the Southern Anhui tourist area depended on.
sentences.chinese: 徽州文化遺產是皖南旅遊區依託的重要旅遊資源。

definition: valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance

pinyin: Fei1 wu4 zhi4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
